item.title: About
item.description: About DataViz.vg wants to make data related to food and nutrition more available by providing easy to read visualizations of the data (data-visualization, or dataviz in short). All articles are related to the Vegetarian/Vegan lifestyle. In each post, we will provide the source of the dataset, a link to it, a key quote (when it’s an article), and how the data were collected, if ever the information is available. The dataset used to build the visualization is also available under each dataviz.

item.title: Resources
item.description: Read Cookbook Thug Kitchen: The Official Cookbook: Eat Like You Give a F*ck (Thug Kitchen Cookbooks) Vegan 100: Over 100 Incredible Recipes from Avant-Garde Vegan Vegan for Everybody: Foolproof Plant-Based Recipes for Breakfast, Lunch, Dinner, and In-Between Plant-Based on a Budget: Delicious Vegan Recipes for Under $30 a Week, in Less Than 30 Minutes a Meal The Plant-Based Diet for Beginners: The Health Benefits of Eating a Plant-Based Diet.
